subject: Fwd: IME needed ASAP
body:
hey there,

need to get someone seen for neuro eval. details below from attorney:

---
claimant maria rodriguez
file# 2024-WC-8891 (might also be listed as WC8891 in your system)
needs neurological evaluation, had TBI from workplace fall
they want it done sometime next week if possible, preferably morning appointment
we're located in san diego area
let me know what you have available
report needed within 2 weeks of exam
---

attached her records and some kind of letter from the adjuster

thx!
John Miller
Quick Referrals LLC

attachments.text_content: Emergency room visit 06/18/2024: Patient Maria Rodriguez, 42yo female, presented after fall from ladder at workplace. Loss of consciousness approximately 2 minutes. CT scan shows mild traumatic brain injury. Admitted for observation. Complained of severe headaches, dizziness, and memory issues...

To Whom It May Concern: This letter authorizes the Independent Medical Examination for claimant Maria Rodriguez, claim number 2024-WC-8891. Please forward all reports to our office within 14 business days of examination. Contact: Jennifer Adams, Claims Adjuster, Pacific Insurance Group.
